description: The lockdown hasÂ offered an avenue for the authorities to form a dragnet across the city. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 'Fighting tooth and nail' for veggies: Shanghai residents bristle under Covid-19 lockdown
title_page: 'Fighting tooth and nail' for veggies: Shanghai residents bristle under Covid-19 lockdown | The Straits Times
maintext:
BEIJING - Shanghai stay-home mother Penny Chan has been waking up at 5.30am for the past two weeks, ahead of her husband and two children.
The reason: grocery delivery slots.
